description:
NinjaTrader is an investor-backed, growth-stage FinTech company with an award-winning platform and over 1 million users. We are building products and services which empower active traders to easily analyze and react to data from the world's leading financial markets. Located in Chicago, our unique employee-centric company culture is one that our team finds inviting, comfortable and fun. Please visit www.ninjatrader.com to learn more about our business.

Data Scientist, Chicago, IL: Develop and implement a set of techniques or analytics applications to transform raw data into meaningful information using data-oriented programming languages and visualization software. Apply data mining and data modeling to extract and analyze information from large structured and unstructured datasets. Visualize, interpret, and report data findings. Develop scalable and automated reporting and analytics. Use SQL, Power BI to query and process data. Use data warehouse technologies like Snowflake, Python, Tableau. Conduct statistical analysis, regression modeling, forecasting and time series analysis to build predicting models. Require a Master's Degree in Information Technology and Management with a major in Data Mgmt., or foreign equivalent. Permanent work authorization required. Mail resumes to NinjaTrader, 222 N. LaSalle St., Ste. 1450, Chicago, IL 60601, Attn: Box IUM or email: careers@ninjatrader.com

Our Core Benefits Include:
• 15 days PTO per year

• And more!
